attributes.action: suggest Scooter are the first band to play at the new theatre in Aylesbury when it opens.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Scooter are a German Dance band who are internationally known as one of the best dance groups in the world.

In order to put the new theatre in Aylesbury on the international map a group who can bring world wide attention needs to be able to perform there, and Scooter are the band to do just that.

To have Scooter open the theatre would show the people of Aylesbury and the UK that Aylesbury is the place to be and will bring Aylesbury world wide media attention.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
